text: São Nicolau is an island of Cape Verde. It is one of the Barlavento group. In 2015, about 12,400 people lived there.Cabo Verde, Statistical Yearbook 2015, Instituto Nacional de Estatística The main towns are Ribeira Brava and Tarrafal de São Nicolau. The island was discovered in 1461 or 1462 by Diogo Afonso, together with the islands of São Vicente and Santo Antão.Valor simbólico do centro histórico da Praia, Lourenço Conceição Gomes, Universidade Portucalense, 2008 ==References== Category:Islands of Cape Verde
title: São Nicolau, Cape Verde
